author: The Editorial Board
title: Treasury’s Qualcomm Reversal
text:
Well, that was fast, and just in time. The Treasury Department announced very late Sunday that it has ordered Qualcomm Inc. to postpone for 30 days its shareholder vote for directors in its takeover brawl with Broadcom Ltd. Treasury said the delay will give the interagency Committee on Foreign Investment in the U.S. (Cfius) “the ability to investigate fully Broadcom’s proposed acquisition of Qualcomm.”

This is the right decision, but the fascinating question is why Treasury changed its mind. Our sources say that even late...
